item.title: Help with MAGIC POOL
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

You made a new topic for this? you truly are an retard…

else if(command.equals("step into")) {
			handleTeleporting();
			}

[code=java]
public void handleTeleporting() {
while(System.currentTimeMillis() - owner.getLastMoved() < 10000 && owner.getLocation().inWilderness()) {
owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@whi@You must stand still for 10 seconds before using portal");
return;
}
String[] main = new String[]{“Somewhere”, “somnewhere”"};
owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(main) {

	public void handleReply(int option, String response)
	{
		if(option == 0 && System.currentTimeMillis() - owner.getCombatTimer() > 10000) {
			owner.setLocation(Point.location(coords, coords), true);
			owner.resetPath();
		} else
		if(option == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - owner.getCombatTimer() > 10000) {
			owner.setLocation(Point.location(coords, coords), true);
			owner.resetPath();
			} 
		}
	}
});
owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(main);

}[/code]

item.title: Help with MAGIC POOL

else if(command.equals("step into")) { if(object.getX() == 102) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You step into the magical portal"); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { owner.teleport(471, 3385, false); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You arrive at the rune essence mine"); } }); } if(object.getID() == 1166 && object.getX() == 471) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You step into the magical portal"); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { owner.teleport(101, 522, false); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You arrive at Varrock"); } }); }
cuz if i using this one i get lot errors

case 1155: owner.setBusy(true); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@Where do you want to be teleported to ?"); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { String[] options = new String[]{"Dragon area", "Varrock", "Dragon maze", "Mage Arena"}; owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) { public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) { switch(option) { case 0: // Dragon area owner.teleport(183, 257, true); break; case 1: // varrock owner.teleport(136, 505, true); break; case 2: // Dragon maze owner.teleport(271, 195, true); break; case 3: // Mage arena owner.teleport(446, 3374, true); break; default: return;
